content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: RSUBJID
      operator: non_empty
    - name: RSUBJID
      operator: equal_to
      value: USUBJID
Core:
  Id: CORE-000231
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Verify that when RSUBJID populated , RSUBJID does not equal USUBJID
Outcome:
  Message: RSUBJID when populated cannot equal USUBJID
  Output Variables:
    - RSUBJID
    - USUBJID
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Value
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0363
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Identifier used to identify a related subject or pool
                  of subjects. RSUBJID will be populated with either the USUBJID of
                  the related subject or the POOLID of the related pool.
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: RSUBJID
                Section: RELSUB
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - RELATIONSHIP
  Domains:
    Include:
      - RELSUB

json.Description: Verify that when RSUBJID populated , RSUBJID does not equal USUBJID

Outcome.Message: RSUBJID when populated cannot equal USUBJID

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Identifier used to identify a related subject or pool of subjects. RSUBJID will be populated with either the USUBJID of the related subject or the POOLID of the related pool.
